display_long_description:
• Stream shows, movies, and videos from your Plex Media Server or a friend's
• Simultaneously watch TV and movies together (up to 4 friends) with voice chat and synced video*
• Full support for 360°/180° and 3D videos
• Three interactive scenes, including a luxury apartment, the void and a drive-in theater*
• Save and play videos directly from your device
• Enable virtual surround sound for simulated 5.1 audio*
• Point & click to play, or grab videos from the menu to review the cover art and more. You can even place a video next to you to watch later!

Plex VR takes all the movies, TV shows and home movies from your Plex Media Server and launches them into virtual reality. Any video content on a server you control, or that’s shared with you, is available in Plex VR on Oculus Go or a Gear VR headset!

Learn more about Plex at https://www.plex.tv/features/vr

* Plex Pass required for access to Drive-in theatre, Virtual Surround, and for Watching Together after one week free trial period
